mapper.select: select reply_no as replyNo, board_no as boardNo, writer, content, regdate from pg_reply where board_no = #{boardNo} order by reply_no ASC
mapper.insert: insert into pg_reply (reply_no, board_no, writer, content, regdate) values (seq_reply_no.nextval, #{boardNo}, #{writer}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
